Description: Example configuration for PostDeploy integration testing
UsageNotes: This configuration enables the PostDeploy stage to run comprehensive integration
tests against the deployed application infrastructure in the TEST environment.
The PostDeploy stage will discover deployed resources, run connectivity tests,
performance validation, and upload detailed test results to S3.
Integration tests include stack validation, API endpoint testing, environment
configuration validation, and resource tagging verification.
Performance tests are enabled for TEST and PROD environments only.
Prerequisites: S3 bucket 'acme-test-results-bucket' must exist for test result uploads
Application should expose testable endpoints (APIs, health checks)
SSM parameters should be configured in the specified hierarchy
CloudFormation stack should have proper tags for resource identification

TestingStrategy.StackValidation: Verifies CloudFormation stack is in healthy state
TestingStrategy.EndpointTesting: Tests API endpoints for accessibility and response codes
TestingStrategy.ResourceTagging: Ensures proper resource tagging for governance
TestingStrategy.PerformanceTesting: Basic response time and success rate validation
